allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Item -Path ''d:\\D Desktop\\PDF editor full featured\\*'' -Force | Select-Object Name, Length, LastWriteTime")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path ''d:\\D Desktop\\PDF editor full featured\\.claude'' -Force | Select-Object Name, Length, LastWriteTime")

Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "import fitz; doc = fitz.open\(\); print\(f''doc is None: {doc is None}''\); print\(f''doc type: {type\(doc\)}''\); doc.new_page\(\); print\(f''page count: {len\(doc\)}''\)")
